newsitem.title: USA: Cotelligent Q3 pro forma shr rises.
newsitem.headline: Cotelligent Q3 pro forma shr rises.

text.p: Three and Nine Months Ended December 31, 1996 and 1995
NOTES: (a) Excludes revenues of $15,610 and $44,979 for
the three and nine months ended December 31, 1995, respectively, of four companies acquired simultaneously with the closing of the Company's initial public offer (the Founding Companies).
(b) After deducting $322 and $1.1 million for the three
and nine months ended December 31, 1995, of non-recurring transactions costs incurred in connection with acquisitions accounted for as poolings of interests.
(c) Historical earnings per share for the three and

nine month periods ended December 31, 1995 have not been presented as it is not considered meaningful given the results of the four Founding Companies are not included prior to the date of the Company's initial public offering.

Pro forma data reflect adjustments for: (i) revenues and costs associated with discontinued operations of an acquired company (fiscal 1996); (ii) compensation differentials to former owners and employees of the acquired companies (fiscal 1997 and fiscal 1996); (iii) termination of contributions to retirement plans (fiscal 1996); (iv) incremental selling, general and administrative costs associated with the Company's corporate activities (fiscal 1996); (v) removal of non-recurring transaction costs associated with certain of the acquired companies (fiscal 1997); and (vi) income taxes as if the entities were combined and subject to the effective federal and state statutory rates throughout the periods (fiscal 1997 and fiscal 1996).
